title: Leprowatch
summary: Watch face for the people, who just enjoy watching power meter.
description: Nice watch face that looks like round power-meter and allows you to enjoy classic view each time when you check what time is it right now.Join the beta test - https://play.google.com/apps/testing/org.unhack.leprowatchface
descriptionHTML:
Nice watch face that looks like round power-meter and allows you to enjoy classic view each time when you check what time is it right now.
Join the beta test - https://play.google.com/apps/testing/org.unhack.leprowatchface
comments: Отличный счетчик, только расскажите, как скрутить показания?
Thank you for this free watch face. I think it could really use a date indicator. Works well on wear 2
recentChanges: In beta desktop widget is available
